//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "roof_guy", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "roof_run" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "roof_spot" );
		set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "10 - Emergency" );
	}

	dowait ( "roof_run" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_ATTACK", "ON" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "player" );
}
